column1: Double MSc "RealMaths - Mathematics for Real World Applications"
column3: Department of Information Engineering, Computer Science and Mathematics
column5: RealMaths - Mathematics for Real World Applications is a set of 2-year Double MSc programmes with focus on scientific computing and applications. Students spend one year at the University of L’Aquila and one year in one of the partner institutions in Canada, Czechia, Poland, Portugal, Sweden.
column7: 500 EUR per semester, i.e. 2,000 EUR in total
